notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This research at UCSD was funded by U.S. Department of Energy, Office of Science, Office of Basic Energy Sciences, under Contracts No. DE-SC0001805. The research of R.K. and I.A.V. was funded by the Helmholtz Associations Initiative and Networking Fund and the Russian Science, grant number HRSF-0002. The research of B.I.O. was funded by the Russian Science Foundation, grant number 18-12-00108. The research of M.S. and F.S. was funded by the DFG, grant numbers SCHE1905/3, SCHE1905/4 and SCHR700/25-1.
